<page title>: Cleverboxes - 9H.LAXLB.HBE | BenQ BL2405HT (24 inch) LED Monitor 1000:1 250cd/m2 1920x1080 5ms DVI-D (Black)
description: The HAS allows you to find the best viewing angles for personal work or screen sharing with an extensive range of monitor adjustments - height, tilt, pivot, stroke and swivel. The screen bottom can be 110mm from the base now. Perfecting Your Audiovisual Enjoyment with Speakers (2W x 2) Whether you're listening to music or watching your favorite film, simply turn on the speakers to experience the audiovisual fun. The BL2405HT comes with an ultra-high dynamic contrast ratio of 12M:1 to add colour depth and definition to darkened and complex visuals, so that everything you see - from the brightest white to the darkest black - is perfectly rendered to deliver the most incredible picture performance. The BL2405HT have passed Windows 8 certification and is fully compatible with Windows 8 colour systems. Plug in the BL2405HT to your computer, and Windows 8 will recognize it instantly, making setup and connection effortless. ecoFACTS can tell you how eco-friendly BenQ products are! Development of eco-friendly products, BenQ doesn't just want to comply with green regulations passively, but also to actively develop eco-friendly products! ecoFACTS declares BenQ's greatest efforts on the replacement of hazardous substances, material selection, packaging design, energy-saving design and other aspects of the products.
